backend/main.mo: Motoko backend storing questions and per-user progress with update and query methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of core frontend files for quick reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme variables and dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing navigation between home, game, and summary screens.
frontend/src/game/gameTypes.ts: Shared game constants and TypeScript types for questions and feedback.
frontend/src/game/questionBank.ts: Fallback built‑in question bank for letters, numbers, and colors.
frontend/src/game/questionSelection.ts: Utility to shuffle and select a set of questions for each game round.
frontend/src/game/useGameSession.ts: Hook controlling game progression, scoring, and feedback timing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing authenticated or anonymous backend actors.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, and identity loading. Wraps AuthClient creation and exposes login state helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and updating user progress and questions from the backend. Uses an actor to call canister methods and manages cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, light/dark themes, and global styles. Applies a playful font and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React, React Query, and the Internet Identity provider, then rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/GameScreen.tsx: Game flow screen that loads questions, manages question progression, handles answers, and displays progress and feedback. Falls back to local question bank when backend data is unavailable.
frontend/src/pages/HomeScreen.tsx: Home screen displaying category choices, user progress, and login/logout controls via Internet Identity. Lets users start a new game by selecting a category.
frontend/src/pages/RoundSummaryScreen.ts: Summary screen showing round results, stars, encouragement, and actions to replay or return home. Updates backend progress if the user is logged in.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme with custom fonts, OKLCH color tokens, extended border radii, shadows, keyframes, and includes typography, container query, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project state for a children’s learning game, including features, requirements, issues, and image asset specifications.
